#include<iostream>
using namespace std;

int main()
{
    int t;
    cin>>t;
    while(t--)
    {
        int n,a[100000],i,j,min,c=0,b[5000]={0};
        cin>>n;
        for(i=1;i<=n;i++)
            cin>>a[i];

        for(i=1;i<=n;i++)
        {
            min=a[i]-i+1;
            for(j=1;j<=n;j++)
            {
                if(a[j]==min)
                b[i]++;
                min++;
            }
            b[i]=n-b[i];
        }
        min=5000;
        for(i=1;i<=n;i++)
        {
            if(min>b[i])
            {
                min=b[i];
            }
        }
        cout<<min<<"\n";
    }
    return(0);
}
